| Uppercase  | Lowercase                | English |
| :--        | :--                      | :--     |
| $\Alpha$   | $\alpha$                 | alpha   |
| $\Beta$    | $\beta$                  | beta    |
| $\Gamma$   | $\gamma$                 | gamma   |  
| $\Delta$   | $\delta$                 | delta   |
| $\Epsilon$ | $\epsilon$ $\varepsilon$ | epsilon |
| $\Zeta$    | $\zeta$                  | zeta    |
| $\Eta$     | $\eta$                   | eta     |
| $\Theta$   | $\theta$                 | theta   |
| $\Iota$    | $\iota$                  | iota    |
| $\Kappa$   | $\kappa$                 | kappa   |
| $\Lambda$  | $\lambda$                | lambda  |
| $\Mu$      | $\mu$                    | mu      |
| $\Nu$      | $\nu$                    | nu      |
| $\Xi$      | $\xi$                    | xi      |
| $\Omicron$ | $\omicron$               | omicron |
| $\Pi$      | $\pi$                    | pi      |
| $\Rho$     | $\rho$                   | rho     |
| $\Sigma$   | $\sigma$                 | sigma   |
| $\Tau$     | $\tau$                   | tau     |
| $\Upsilon$ | $\upsilon$               | upsilon |
| $\Phi$     | $\phi$ $\varphi$         | phi     |
| $\Chi$     | $\chi$                   | chi     |
| $\Psi$     | $\psi$                   | psi     |
| $\Omega$   | $\omega$                 | omega   |
